document.full_text: ford motor co  reluctantly agreed on thursday to greatly expand a recall of its f-150 pickup, the best-selling vehicle in north america, on concerns that some air bags could unexpectedly deploy.
document.title: ford expands recall to more than 1.4 million f-150s
lines_and_colors: ford motor co  reluctantly agreed on thursday to greatly expand a recall of its f-150 pickup, the best-selling vehicle in north america, on concerns that some air bags could unexpectedly deploy.
